评论详情: I like the pretty floral shirt. It's a nice lightweight fabric good for spring or fall. It girts well and like the details.
Beautiful colors great fabric not see-through wonderful price

评论详情: I really like this top, it fit perfectly.  The print is very pretty... I'd order another in a different print if they had something more classic in true winter coloring
This is absolutely gorgeous! The color is amazing. The sleeves and details are beautiful!

This is fun! It’s giving me Lilly P vibes. The puffy shoulders are super cute. It’s soft and comfortable. I like the length in the back and the colors. I never know which size to order because I am between sizes. I ordered the xxl and I probably could’ve gotten the xl. It runs true to size but if you are between sizes I would order down (but there isn’t stretch).
The colorful leaves were much larger than pictured. Quality seemed fine, cute details, just very unflattering on me.
Very flattering, great color.

This paisley blouse is airy, and comfortable. The large paisley print is not overpowering, and pairs well with shorts, jeans, or slacks for casual wear to business casual wear. It's machine washable, and is mostly wrinkle-free.
I love the fit of this top, and the bright colors that are on it as well.

This is a lovely blouse and very stylish and well designed.  It fits like a glove, although if you are hippy you might find the bottom too snug. But it fell just right on me, and it looked like a million dollars! So nicely tailored on top, and the combination of the shoulders and the cuffs make it look so classy and sharp. I'm definitely planning to order more - and there are so many choices I'm not sure what to pick. i'm very happy with this blouse and think you will be too.
I love this shirt!!! I got every one they had in my size. So very comfortable and can be dressed up or down. Colors are vibrant and I got lots of compliments on it. A great addition to my wardrobe.
This cool breathable blouse is so flowy and lightweight. It's versatile and can be dressed up or down. The colors are vibrant and bold. Beautiful.

This is a very lovely blouse . It has bold patterns that definitely make you stand out . It fits true to size and the material is loose and comfy . I would say this blouse is more in the dressy side .

This is a very nice shirt. Whoever did the designs on these shirts has a really good eye for bright and cheerful patterns, which leads into a shirt that makes you smile every time you see it. Fits well, nice fabric and stitching, and a good value.

This blouse is a soft silky polyester material.  The pattern is very colorful and vibrant.  I got a medium (I’m usually a large) and it fits perfectly.  It is a very noticeable top so don’t get it unless you want lots of positive attention!

I'm obsessed with this blouse! The pattern of the fabric is so fun, colorful, and retro. The style and fit is great as well and I've received SO many compliments the two times I've worn it. The fabric is a great quality and feels nice on my skin. I think it's versatile, breathable, and loose enough to be worn in warm weather but also great as a layering piece or by itself in colder weather. Love it!

This printed top is like a stylish secret weapon in my wardrobe! Resembling the iconic aesthetics of a famous bright-colored clothing line, it adds an instant touch of glamour. The vibrant hues and intricate patterns make it a standout piece. The attention to detail is impressive, and the fit is both comfortable and flattering. It's not just a shirt; it's a confidence booster. Pairing it with jeans or a skirt turns any day into a fashion statement. It's a beautiful addition that effortlessly captures the spirit of the renowned brand, making every wear a nod to chic style.

This flowy, flowery blouse is attractive, lightweight, breathable, and very versatile. You can wear it dressed up with a skirt and a pair of wedges, or dressed down with a pair of jeans, an open sweater, and some brown ballet flats, or as a beach-going outfit with high-waisted shorts, sandals, and a large sun hat!  Highly recommended for the spring and summer.  Thank you for reading my review! All of my reviews are honest and true to my likes and dislikes. I am unbiased in my opinions. I hope this helped you in making an informed purchasing decision!
Gorgeous print and the blouse is extremely comfortable

I loooooove this blouse! The colors are bright and vivid. Neon take on 90's design. Fits as expected. Buttons stay shut and stitching is even. No flaws. Just adorable nostalgic, comfortable, fashionable blouse.  Fabric is breathable but not cotton.

This beautiful loose V neck blouse for women is very comfortable, the paisley pattern gives it a bit of a retro appearance, they come in various sizes and colors.  Size indicated was a perfect fit, the blouse is very well made, does well with a small load of laudry with similar items and I only put in the dryer for about 15 minutes then hang it up to allow it to finish drying naturally.  Makes for an affordable gift idea.
This is a beautiful blouse! It has vivid colors and soft flowing material!  I highly recommend this product.

The Astylish Women's V Neck Paisley Print Top instantly brightens my day with its vibrant colors. The quality is impressive - it's well-made, comfortable, and fits just right. The lantern sleeves add a unique and fashionable touch, elevating the blouse from a basic top to a statement piece. It's versatile enough to pair with jeans for a casual look or dress up with a skirt. The V-neck design is flattering, and the overall boho vibe of the top is perfect for summer. A delightful addition to my wardrobe that's both stylish and fun.

The bright colors reminds me of the 90s attire.  I've had over 10 compliments today just because my personality is bubbly and this bright print goes well for me.  I paired it with orange heels and nice pants.  Very cute.

I don't usually wear so vibrant and colorful clothes, but it looked so fun, so I said why not. It has been one of my favorite tops since I got it! The shirt is very comfortable, it can be dressed down or up with accessories. It is lightweight and breath well. Love it.
I get so many compliments when I wear this shirt. It’s fun and bright!
I ordered this shirt for my daughter. The colors are bright and the material is pretty comfortable against the skin. It fits as expected for the size ordered.
I was a bit hesitant to buy this shirt, but I'm so glad that I did! Fits perfect, very comfortable, and the colors are so vibrant. Lots of compliments! Will plan to buy more from this seller.

This top is pretty and comfortable. It pulls on, which is a plus.  The cuffs can be worn at the wrists or pulled up on the forearm.  The elastic keeps the cuffs in place.  This top flows and is not a slim cut.

The colors are vibrant (I got the 'red' version) and this looks great with jeans, especially white jeans.  It's all you'll need for a chilly summer evening or air-conditioned restaurant. Yet, colors will easily take this into fall.  The fabric is (surprisingly) very soft and comfortable. Though I got a size smaller than my usual, this is still roomy enough. (I like a 'big shirt' look but in my usual size, this would have been too big.)

评论概述: Super cute for my Fall work wardrobe!
评论详情: Really love this top for work or brunch! The sunflowers are reminiscent of autumn & the sleeve length is perfect for fall. I sm 5’9” & it fit great. The sleeves have cute Detail & it won’t require intensive laundering. Cute tucked in!
